blogPost.excerpt: Coverr is a resource for beautiful free and exclusive stock videos for commercial and non-commercial use, no attribution required. This should be your go-to destination when searching a video for your next project.
blogPost.body: Coverr is a resource for beautiful free and exclusive stock videos for commercial and non-commercial use, no attribution required. This should be your go-to destination when searching a video for your next project.
blogPost.title: Coverr 3.0 - Free stock videos for creators. No attribution required.
blogPost.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: Coverr是一个美丽的免费和独家的库存视频资源，用于商业和非商业用途，不需要注明来源。当您为您的下一个项目搜索视频时，这里应该是您的首选之地。
localize.tagline: 免费库存视频为创作者。无需归属。

localize.description: Coverr是一個美麗的免費和獨家的庫存視頻資源，用於商業和非商業用途，不需要註明來源。當您爲您的下一個項目搜索視頻時，這裏應該是您的首選之地。
localize.tagline: 免費庫存視頻爲創作者。無需歸屬。

previous.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
previous.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers

localize.description: B2B买家已经厌倦了传统的销售流程，他们希望获得类似B2C的购买体验。Deal Rooms将改变您的销售流程，以B2B买家想要的方式进行销售。从开放到关闭，交易室帮助您的销售团队卖得更多，卖得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室为B2B买家创造类似B2C的购买体验

localize.description: B2B買家已經厭倦了傳統的銷售流程，他們希望獲得類似B2C的購買體驗。Deal Rooms將改變您的銷售流程，以B2B買家想要的方式進行銷售。從開放到關閉，交易室幫助您的銷售團隊賣得更多，賣得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室爲B2B買家創造類似B2C的購買體驗
